item.title: API Documentation
item.description: fuzzychinese # [view_source] fuzzychinese._character_to_stroke # [view_source] Stroke Objects # class Stroke(object) [view_source] A class to translate a chinese character into strokes. Arguments: dictionary_filepath str - default=None. File path for user provided dictionary. Default dictionary will be used if not specified. A valid dictionary should be a “UTF-8” encoded text file, having two columns separated by space. First column is the character and the second column is its corresponding decomposition with each char stands for each stroke.
